bridge-type.label: Hue Bridge
bridge-type.description: The Hue Bridge represents the Philips Hue Bridge.

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of the Hue Bridge.

parameter.name: protocol
parameter.label: Protocol
parameter.description: Protocol to connect to the Hue Bridge (http or https).

parameter.name: useSelfSignedCertificate
parameter.label: Use Self-Signed Certificate
parameter.description: Use self-signed certificate for HTTPS connection to Hue Bridge.

parameter.name: userName
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: Name of a registered Hue Bridge user, that allows to access the API.

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Seconds between fetching values from the Hue Bridge. Default is 10.

parameter.name: sensorPollingInterval
parameter.label: Sensor Polling Interval
parameter.description: Milliseconds between fetching sensor-values from the Hue Bridge. A higher value means more delay for the sensor values, but a too low value can cause congestion on the Hue Bridge. Use 0 to disable the polling for sensors. Default is 500.

bridge-type.label: Hue API v2 Bridge
bridge-type.description: The Hue Bridge represents a Philips Hue Bridge supporting API v2.

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: Network Address
parameter.description: Network address of the Hue Bridge.

parameter.name: applicationKey
parameter.label: Application Key
parameter.description: A registered Hue Bridge application key that allows access to the API.

parameter.name: checkMinutes
parameter.label: Connection Check Interval
parameter.description: Minutes between retrying the HTTP 2 and SSE connections. Default is 60.

parameter.name: useSelfSignedCertificate
parameter.label: Use Self-Signed Certificate
parameter.description: Use self-signed certificate for HTTPS connection to Hue Bridge.
